author: MiaRomero
body:
* Fixing #3180 
* Added ValidateSet to the -FileFormat parameter for possible log file types and updated the function that was previously validating the file formats.
* Removed the invalid format error message from resources files.
* Updated tests to reflect new FullyQualifiedErrorId.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
@MiaRomero Please make your membership in the Microsoft Organization public.  I sent instructions offline.

#Resolved

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @MiaRomero What is the status of this PR?

comments.author: MiaRomero
comments.body:
Hi @TravisEz13,
I've addressed @adityapatwardhan's and @SteveL-MSFT's comments regarding the cmdlet and test code.  I added a comment asking for clarification on the documentation.  Once I have that I can open the appropriate issue.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: I pinged @MiaRomero about updating her profile in order to get the PR merged.

comments.author: MiaRomero
comments.body: @TravisEz13 thanks for the link, updated my profile.

title: Add tab completion for Export-Counter -FileFormat parameter
